conversations.content: I have many items in my cart and want to clear out everything except for the electric toothbrush. Please remove the other items and place the order.

<|Function_Thought|>
The cart contains three items: "TechBrand Wireless Mouse" (product_id: P001), "Backpack" (product_id: P017), and "Electric Toothbrush" (product_id: P011). To fulfill the user's request, I need to remove the products with IDs P001 and P017 from the cart, leaving only the electric toothbrush. After that, I will place the order for the remaining item.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P001")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P001 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
The "TechBrand Wireless Mouse" with product_id P001 has been successfully removed from the cart. Now I need to remove the "Backpack" with product_id P017 to ensure only the electric toothbrush remains.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[cart_remove_product(product_id="P017")]<|/Function_Call|>
Product ID P017 removed from cart.

<|Function_Thought|>
Both the "TechBrand Wireless Mouse" and "Backpack" have been successfully removed from the cart. Only the "Electric Toothbrush" remains in the cart. Now I will proceed to place the order for the electric toothbrush.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[checkout_selected_cart(product_ids=["P011"])]<|/Function_Call|>
Please verify your account to proceed the checkout. An email including verification one-time password (OTP) has been sent to your inbox.

To proceed with the checkout, please verify your account by entering the one-time password (OTP) that has been sent to your email inbox. Once you have it, let me know, and I can proceed with the verification.
